# Instant Cocoa

Site & docs for [Instant Cocoa](https://github.com/khanlou/instantcocoa/).

## Setup
1. Install the dependencies:
   ```console
   gem install jekyll sass-globbing
   npm install
   ```

2. Start the server:
   ```console
   grunt serve
   ```

3. Start the build:
   ```console
   grunt
   ```

4. Point your browser to `http://localhost:4000`.
